function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High risk of contagion in a closed fitness studio environment","Impact":"Potential widespread transmission of contagious diseases among clients and staff","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, provide adequate ventilation, and enforce social distancing measures","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, touchless entry systems, and disinfection technology","People":"Clients, trainers, staff members","Owner":"Studio management"},{"Description":"Inadequate capacity for remote service delivery","Impact":"Loss of revenue and potential customer dissatisfaction","Mitigation":"Invest in technology for online consultations and ensure easy access for clients","Technologies":"Video communication tools, secure payment systems, and customer relationship management software","People":"Nutrition consultant, pilates studio clients","Owner":"Maggie, pilates studio management"},{"Description":"Limited capability to continue operations online","Impact":"Loss of customer engagement and revenue","Mitigation":"Provide training and support for trainers to facilitate online classes, optimize online class offerings","Technologies":"Video conferencing platforms, online scheduling tools, and virtual workout applications","People":"Gym owners, trainers, customers","Owner":"Gym owners"}]}
